description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

Validations catches cases that are not forest types and returns NOT_APPLICABLE. No horizontal structure so all NFL polygons should be NOT_APPLICABLE. Translation re-uses the custom function from the AVI in AB. First checks for any Complex rows labelled as CX in the vert column, translates them as COMPLEX if present. Then returns SINGLE_LAYERED if one forest layer and MULTI_LAYERED if two forest layers. Null arguments in the translation function are additional species slots used in AB but not required in ON.

Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Assumes valid LYR1 row must have ospcomp, LYR2 must have uspcomp, NFL1 must have polytype. NFL only occurs if there is no forest LYR info. Note that polytype has value FOR when there is forest info, so number of layers should never exceed 2. When ospcomp and uspcomp are empty, polytype is always an NFL value so layer count will always be 1.
